Link Canvas - Art links for later

Hey there, Digital artists! happy to introduce Link Canvas, your new tool for keeping track of all those inspiring art tutorials, references, and creative ideas you stumble upon while browsing.

I wanted to create this to get a hold of the tabs issue I have in Chrome, Imagine this: you're browsing the web, and you come across a fantastic tutorial or an article that you found interesting. You want to dive in and try them out but now's not the right time but you already have like a 1000 tab open. Enter LinkCanvas - with just a click, you can save that site to your LinkCanvas list and come back to it when you're ready without adding an additional tab.

Link Canvas lets you save your art-related links in a breeze. Simply save links from your current tab with a click and access them later.

Key Features:
* Effortlessly save art-related links for later inspiration
* Enjoy a clean and artist-friendly interface that puts your creativity first
* Never lose track of that amazing art tip or reference again!

Whether you're a digital artist, illustrator, or productivity enthusiast, LinkCanvas is your go-to tool. Try Link Canvas today and take your digital art journey to the next level!
